## CopyrightProvider interface

`CopyrightProvider` is an interface to retrieve copyrights information for geographic region specified by bounding box.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CopyrightProvider 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getCopyrights(geoBox, level)](./harp-mapview.copyrightprovider.getcopyrights.md) | Retrieves copyrights. |
